Commands.Beat Rush: 3-hit melee BRV attack  Target: Low chance 2 turns ATK Down I  Extra damage to skeleton types
Commands.Battle Cry: Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV × 2  Self: 2 turns MAX BRV Up I, the Zangan Way
Commands.Dolphin Blow: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 150% of Max BRV.  Initiates a Chase Sequence.  Grants Fever Time for 3 turns.  Extends the duration of Max BRV Up and The Zangan Way by 3 turns.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while Fever Time is active.  BRV Attack+ is a 3-HIT melee BRV attack.  Fever Time raises Critical Rate and BRV damage inflicted by critical hits.

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.Break Fever Boost: Improves the effects of Break Fever by 5%
Artifacts.Mighty Beat Rush: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Beat Rush by 10%
Artifacts.Bravery Battle Cry: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Battle Cry

Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Beat Rush Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Beat Rush.
Passives.Power Break: Grants a low probability of inflicting a Small Attack Down debuff for 3 turns after a BRV Attack.
Passives.Skeleton Killer: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to Skeleton-type targets.
Passives.Battle Cry Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Battle Cry.
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Battle Cry Charge: Increases the max uses of Battle Cry by 1.
Passives.Beat Rush Charge: Increases the max uses of Beat Rush by 1.
Passives.Break Fever: Grants a Small Max BRV Up buff for 3 turns after breaking an enemy
Passives.Buff Attack Speed: Slightly raises ATK, SPD with active buffs
Passives.Beat Rush Extension: Beat Rush use +2When using Beat Rush:  Slight damage boost  Slightly increased damage when attacking skeleton types  Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%  Triggers additional HP attack if BRV at least 100% of MAX at time of use
Passives.Battle Cry Attack: Moderately raises ATK while the Zangan Way active
Passives.Battle Cry Extension: When using Battle Cry:  MAX BRV Up duration +2  The Zangan Way duration +2  Slight BRV increase based on ATK  Higher turn rate

Weapons.Mythril Claw CP: 35: Raises the BRV gain of Battle Cry and lowers its Action Delay.Increases the potency of Max BRV Up and "The Zangan Way" and extends their duration.
Weapons.Tiger Fang CP: 15: Increases the potency of Beat Rush.Raises the success rate of Attack Down and extends its duration.
